resources.string: Click on the moderator to start the timer of the debate. \nClick again to see the remaining time.\nWhen the time for the debate has ended, click to see the results.

Click on a participant to assign the turn or put their in the waiting list. \nLong click to remove the participant from the speaking turn or from the waiting list. \nDouble click to change the name and see the statistics.
